dmca.title: Avatar / Star's Edge Complains of Newsletter in Google Groups (#2)
dmca.body:
February 24, 2004 Google, Inc. Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints [private] Mountain View, CA 94043 Fax: [private] STAR'S EDGE INTERNATIONAL [private] Altamonte Springs, FLORIDA 32714 [private] Tel [private] Fax [private]@AVATARHQ.COM E-MAIL Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement Under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) Dear Sir or Madam: We recently learned of content available through the Google groups function which infringes our copyright. Pursuant to the DMCA, the copyright owner respectfully requests that you remove the unauthorized, infringing materials from your web site immediately. The copyrighted work infringed is a partial newsletter. It was copyrighted in 2000 by [private]. All rights reserved. The message ID infringing post is
The complete header text is: From: "[private]" <[private]@wanadoo.nl> Newsgroups: alt.clearing.avatar Subject: Harry Palmer talking about Feel Its (clarified) Date: Fri, 20 Feb 2004 14:05:59 +0100 Organization: Planet Internet Lines: 173 Message-ID: NNTP-Posting-Host: ip9l350020.speed.planet.nl X-Trace: reader08.wxs.nl 1077282766 18796 145.53.0.32 (20 Feb 2004 13:12:46 GMT) X-Complaints-To: abuse@planet.nl NNTP-Posting-Date: 20 Feb 2004 13:12:46 GMT X-Newsreader: Microsoft Outlook Express 5.00.2615.200 X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.2615.200 Path: news2.lightlink.com!newslightlink.com!gail.ripco.com!news.mbo.net!newsfeed.hal-mli.net!feeder1.hal-mli.net!news.moat.net!feeder.enertel.nl!nntpfeed0l.ops.asmr-Ol.energisidc.net!news.cambrium.nl!news.cambrium.nl!news2.euro.net!newsfeed.wxs.nl!textnews.wxs.nl!not-for-mail Xref: news2.lightlink.com alt.clearing.avatar:4369
I represent the copyright holder in this matter as his authorized agent. My address, telephone number, and e-mail address are: [private], Esquire Star's Edge International [private] Altamonte Springs, Florida 32714 [private] E-mail: [private]@AvatarEPC.com I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain, that the use of the copyrighted materials is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Pursuant to the DMCA, the copyright owner respectfully requests that you immediately remove the infringing materials from your website. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the above information in this notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf. Please notify me when the infringing content has been removed. If you require further information, let me know and I will provide it without delay. Thank you for your assistance in this matter. Sincerely, [private], Esquire Corporate Counsel
